channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for MA
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for MA

item.title: Report E-2024010349
item.description:
Report E-2024010349

Identified by scraper @ 2024-01-22T15:12:13+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-01-11
  • City: CANTON
  • State: MA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: R&L CARRIERS SHARED SERVICES, L.L.C.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: On January 11, 2024, one (1) 55-gallon drum of UN3266 was damaged due to improper loading and released approximately fifteen (15) gallons of product to the trailer interior. R+L Carriers retained Cura Emergency Services, LC who dispatched a crew from Green Site Services Group (GSSG) to remediate the impacted site. GSSG personnel deployed granular absorbents and a neutralizing agent to remediate the site. All spent absorbents and debris were collected and containerized into one (1) 55-gallon drum and one (1) cubic yard box. The damaged 55-gallon drum of product was placed into one (1) 95-gallon drum. All containers were staged onsite for future disposal.
